reviews: I am surprised to see how pretty the watch is, and it has a crystal face which is hard to scratch and  water proof too.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Gift to myself and my sister. It was pretty and awesome. Actually I love it. Its so high standard looking of time piece. The price is perfect on my budget .

reviews: Fit well eventhough i have small wrist.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: This is made of cheap material. The case was already damaged and the watch was looking Chinese-made $10 quality. Unfortunately, this was disappointing! I was going to take this watch to overseas but i can't gift this to anyone. I will refund it ASAP.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: The underside of the watch is starting to petina after 3 months of irregular wear. If this continues at this rate I will be returning the product. This is terrible quality.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: I love the product, the quality is good but  I am not sure that this product is the orignal Anne klein product or the copy one

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: I like the fact that the watch arrived on time and in good condition

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Ya he comprado muchos relojes Anne Klein y me encantan. Buena calidad a un buen precio. Los recomiendo.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: I like silver-tone watches with black faces. It took a while to find this one with the size face I like. It’s simple but it goes nice with almost everything I wear.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: It looks expensive even though the price was really affordable during prime day. I love it.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Beautiful and classy, but way too small.  If Anne Klein can't send me at least 3 clasp links, it will be going back since my wrist is 8 inches. Most Companies offer large and some even go as far as offering ex-large.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 March 2024

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: heureusement que la montre n'est pas fragile, elle a ete balancee par terre, derriere le portail,a 21h! si la pluie etait arrivee ou qu'on ait roulé dessus en voiture....n'importe quoi les livreurs Amazon!

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: nice size and love the face colour and bracelet

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Definitivamente lo recomiendo. Este reloj se lo compré a mi madre y tiene un gran estilo, es idéntico a la foto, el diseño es muy elegante y el tamaño es mediano, se ve muy bonito cualquier estilo de ropa que lo quieras combinar y a pesar de llevar un buen rato usándolo mantiene su brillo y calidad, se ve como si fuera nuevo, excelente para regalar o usarlo tu mism@.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: I have purchased a different variant for my sister few months back. I couldn't take my eyes of it so I purchased rose gold and green one for me. Anne klein watches are the best when it comes to style and quality and amazon have really amazing discounts. Worth for this price.lovely watch.a must buy go for it guys.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: no me esperara que fuera tan llamativo, y la caja  le da un toque de elegancia. Me gusto mucho

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: I love the design but this was little loose than expected. The size needs to be a bit smaller for better fit.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Beautiful watch with removable links so no need to get bracelet adjusted.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Love it! Comes with an extra link so adjustable to your hand size remove or stay on as needed. Little and neat

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Very nice watch
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 January 2020

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Es un hermoso reloj para regalar, el precio esta bastante bien para la calidad, trae una leyenda que dice “diamante genuino” por la piedra que tiene incrustada, pero no se si sea un diamante real porque no trae certificado.A pesar de esto, esta bellísimo el reloj y si lo recomiendo mucho.La muy malo es la caja donde viene, se rompió la bisagra que trae desde la primera vez que abrí la caja, me decepcionó porque está muy elegante, pero no creo que deba afectar mi calificación.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 February 2024

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: At first I was disappointed because I was expecting a Rose colored watch but had clicked on this one instead. Am used to it now, and do like the green face.The band is a little tight and at one point I was going to get an extension, but no, it fits fine and not likely to fall off.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 December 2020

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: El reloj lo compre como regalo de aniversario para mi esposa, le gustó bastante, no sé si la piedra que trae sea un diamante legítimo ya que no encontré ningún certificado, solo una etiqueta que decía "diamante genuino", pero en general el reloj está muy bien.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: There's a smudge on the inside of the glass cover for the face of the watch. Apart from that, the watch is nice, comfortable on the wrist, and has a 'link' that can be removed by the owner to reduce the band size, which is quite convenient. Look forward to my next watch purchase.

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Beautiful gift!! Arrived and in time and recipient loves it and wears it everyday!

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Bought this for my my mom for christmas. Haven’t given it to her yet. But first impression, really pretty. Very impressed. The rose gold is such a nice and suble color. love it. Hopefully my mom loves it too. Lolll
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 March 2024

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch

name: Anne Klein Women's AK/1362CHGB Diamond-Accented Gold-Tone Bracelet Watch
reviews: Estaba buscando un reloj un poco mas formal de los que normalmente uso y me pareció una buena opción tengo 1 semana usándolo de forma intermitente y todo bien.Tiene un eslabón extra que se puede quitar, sin el me queda un poquito apretado, pero con el eslabón extra me queda grande.En general se ve de buena calidad, veamos cuanto aguanta.
